boardgame.name: Great Western
Great Western Trail
Great Western Trail: Aventură prin Vestul Sălbatic
Great Western Trail: La Gran Ruta del Oeste
A nagy western utazás
Великий западный путь
グレート ウエスタン トレイル
大西部之路
大西鐵路
그레이트 웨스턴 트레일
boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;America in the 19th century: You are a rancher and repeatedly herd your cattle from Texas to Kansas City, where you send them off by train. This earns you money and victory points. Needless to say, each time you arrive in Kansas City, you want to have your most valuable cattle in tow. However, the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Great Western Trail_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; not only requires that you keep your herd in good shape, but also that you wisely use the various buildings along the trail. Also, it might be a good idea to hire capable staff: cowboys to improve your herd, craftsmen to build your very own buildings, or engineers for the important railroad line._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;If you cleverly manage your herd and navigate the opportunities and pitfalls of Great Western Trail, you surely will gain the most victory points and win the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Pick up the game at my game store (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking Germany: 5,99€ for the first item card games or smaller boxes might be cheaper (please contact me beforehand) EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. Please contact spieleberatung@t-online.de and I will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. This item has been played three times. All components accounted for and really in Like New condition, but I figured since it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s been played, I should list it as Very Good. All cards are sleeved and a vinyl sticker for the Red 8b Tile misprint has already been applied. It looks almost identical to the tile face. Please contact me for shipping quotes, but I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll likely ship it Priority Mail.

Brand new in shrink. USPS flat rate shipping $15. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll throw in 20 wooden houses (5 in each player color) to place on the players buildings when they get placed on the board. The houses make it easier to see who_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s buildings are who_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s.
Game weight: 1.670 kg

I accidentally got two copies, and I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t believe in gouging people for my mistakes, so I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m asking exactly what I paid for it. I usually ship USPS Priority Mail because it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s easiest for me. I will investigate UPS or FedEx Ground if you want. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to ship this outside the US, but you do so at your own risk. I would recommend insurance.
Game weight: 1.670 kg
